metadata.provider_description: This section allows you to connect and customize your preferred Large Language Model (LLM) providers and models for personal use. Set up API keys, choose models, and adjust settings to enhance your AI experience.
metadata.model_description: This section allows you to connect and customize your preferred Large Language Model (LLM) providers and models for personal use. Set up API keys, choose models, and adjust settings to enhance your AI experience.

provider.name: Name
provider.base_url_description: The LLM API baseUrl refers to the root endpoint URL used to access a Large Language Model (LLM) API service.
provider.api_dialect_description: Completion API Dialect suggests possible outputs, Embedding API Dialect converts them to vectors, and Rerank API Dialect optimizes their order based on semantic relevance.
provider.api_key_placeholder: Please enter the api key for the model provider.
provider.api_key_description: To access the AI model's capabilities, you need to provide a valid API Key from your chosen model provider. This key serves as a secure authentication method, allowing the system to process your requests while maintaining privacy and usage control.
provider.delete_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete provider and remove your data from our servers.
provider.publish_confirm: Confirm publishing this provider to public? This action is irreversible and the provider will be visible to all admins.

default_model.help: Clearing selection will delete the default model configuration for this scenario
